data.name: Sherlock Holmes Chapter One - Artbook
data.detailed_description: Pay a visit to the unique world of Sherlock Holmes Chapter One with this attractive digital artbook that encompasses a vast collection of concept art, drawings, sketches, and renders. This artbook was designed to give you an exclusive behind-the-scenes look into how we created the extraordinary world of Cordona and its intriguing characters.
data.about_the_game: Pay a visit to the unique world of Sherlock Holmes Chapter One with this attractive digital artbook that encompasses a vast collection of concept art, drawings, sketches, and renders. This artbook was designed to give you an exclusive behind-the-scenes look into how we created the extraordinary world of Cordona and its intriguing characters.
